translation.en: Singing where?

translation.en: Where you gonna find the time to do that when you're working for me and here?
translation.ja: 俺の曲作りも 店番もあるのに

translation.en: Stop being silly, man.
translation.ja: バカ言うな

translation.en: Well, you're not gonna like it, but at first, I'm gonna be singing on Bulla's new track.
translation.ja: でもブラが新曲のコーラスに 誘ってくれたの

translation.en: Heard my voice. He thinks I might have suttin'.
translation.ja: 私の声を気に入ったって

translation.en: -You're joking, innit? -Nah.
translation.ja: 冗談だろ？ いいえ

translation.en: I spoke to Mark earlier. He's gonna trial manage me for--
translation.ja: マークがマネジメントを…

translation.en: -Mum! Are you hearing this? -[Aria] Leave me out of it.
translation.ja: 母さん 聞いたか 私は知らないよ

translation.en: Vita! That's my rival you know?
translation.ja: ヤツは俺の宿敵だぞ

translation.en: This is about me doing suttin' I think I can do.
translation.ja: 私にはチャンスなの

translation.en: How you mean? You've been there with me since day one. You know how much that guy mads me.
translation.ja: 俺がヤツに何をされたか 覚えてるだろ

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I've been in it with you from day one, and I'm still in it now.
translation.ja: そうだけど これとは別の話よ

translation.en: -Look at what I'm doing. -You tryin' to fuck up my comeback, innit?
translation.ja: 俺の復帰を潰す気か

translation.en: Who can I trust to write with me if you go, huh? I'm fucked.
translation.ja: お前がいなきゃ 誰が俺の曲を書く？

translation.en: Write with you, or write for you?
translation.ja: 私に丸投げするつもり？

translation.en: Vita, please. Your brother's upset.
translation.ja: 助けてやってよ

translation.en: When isn't he upset, Mum? When aren't I doing everything to make sure he's okay?
translation.ja: こうやって また全部 私に押しつけるの？

translation.en: If you'd let me be your manager, I wouldn't have to do my own thing.
translation.ja: マネジャーの件で… 黙れ

translation.en: -Within your lane, man. -Nah, nah, nah. I've listened to you long enough, Bosco.
translation.ja: 私は兄さんの言いなりだった

translation.en: And I ain't staying in any lane. I'm gonna swerve right into yours.
translation.ja: でも私だって 表舞台に立ちたい

translation.en: Look at the jealousy. I always knew this was gonna happen. I knew it.
translation.ja: お前 俺の成功を ねたんでるんだな

translation.en: Jealous, Bosco?
translation.ja: ねたむ？

translation.en: I've been living, breathing, writing,
translation.ja: 曲を書いてきたのは この私よ

translation.en: and lying for you ever since I can remember.
translation.ja: そしてウソをつき続けてきた

translation.en: Everything I do is to make sure you're good.
translation.ja: 兄さんのためにね

translation.en: But in your head, I was always gonna be in your shadow, innit?
translation.ja: 私はずっと日陰の存在だと？

translation.en: Well, it's Champion versus Champion now.
translation.ja: 今後は家族といえど ライバルよ

translation.en: So get ready.
translation.ja: 覚悟して

translation.en: ♪ Champion to the world ♪
translation.ja: 世界のチャンピオン

translation.en: ♪ Winners only, that's why they say That I'm champion to your girl ♪
translation.ja: 目指すは勝利のみ 　　　あの娘のために

translation.en: ♪ Gucci holding my waist up Every champion needs a belt ♪
translation.ja: 腰に巻いた 　　チャンピオンベルト

translation.en: ♪ Winners recognize winners If you're a champion, I can tell ♪
translation.ja: 本物の勝者なら 　　ひと目で分かる

translation.en: ♪ I can tell ♪
translation.ja: ひと目でな

translation.en: ♪ Champion to the world ♪

translation.ja: 腰に巻いた 　　チャンピオンベルト

translation.ja: 本物の勝者なら 　ひと目で分かる

translation.en: ♪ I can tell ♪
